title: Calculating the heart rating : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
How do you calculate the heart rating displayed on a filmâ€™s page?
A film needs to have a minimum threshold of votes for the heart rating to be displayed. We also do not display the heart rating for a film before it has actually been screened/released.
The rating algorithm is a complex formula that calculates the weighted average of ratings from ticket buyers, non-transacting users and critic reviews. The formula is designed such that ratings from ticket buyers have the maximum influence on the overall heart rating of the film.
